name: Pocket Troops
blurb: Recruit, train, equip, fight. Repeat.\nThe simplest and the most positive war game ever!

rewards.reward: KARMA HEALER: Get +1 in your Karma. Our deepest gratitude for your interest and willingness to stay with us.\r\nIt will be great for our team members to friend you on Facebook.
WALLPAPER: Pack of a high-res game wallpapers\r\n+ "KARMA HEALER" reward

ECSTASY OF GOLD: It is as simple as the name of the tier \u2013 you get a chest full of in-game GOLD CURRENCY. Spend it to get extra skill points  for your troopers, upgrade weapons or recruit new soldiers in your team + "KARMA HEALER" and "WALLPAPER" rewards

BELIEF HERO: Your name will be present in our in-game Board of Kickstarter Heroes screen. Credits will go through all game versions, your name stays with our team. You will also be immortalized on Pocket Troops website in the Hall of Fame, with a link to your website/personal page/blog (if you wish) + ALL REWARDS ABOVE
SORRY, IT IS RESERVED: Reserve the name for your Pocket Troops army - it will be unique in the whole World + ALL REWARDS ABOVE
OPERATION "KS" VETERAN: Achievement with unique design meant for backers only and granted once + ALL REWARDS ABOVE

SUITE UP!: We like T-Shirts. You like T-Shirts. Everybody likes T-Shirts. We all buy them from time to time anyway. We are glad to offer an exclusive Backers design T-Shirts in a variety of sizes. Just let us know yours and do not forget to check out the mailbox + ALL REWARDS ABOVE.            \r\nGet each extra T-Shirt just for $30.  Collect a whole week \u201cNew day \u2013 New T-Shirt\u201d pack. Hm\u2026 well\u2026 Actually, there are just 6 of them right now. Nobody needs a T-Shirt on Sunday anyway!

SECOND SKIN: Unique Kickstarter campaign skin for troopers of your brigade, you choose. If you decide to change troopers appearance, this unique skin will stay related to your account. Shall you decide to suite it again, we will just wrap it up again, on your request + ALL REWARDS ABOVE

SUPERSTAR: Join Troopers squad in the printed hi-res poster signed by Heyworks team. We will contact all backers and will guide you through photo process: best poses to choose, quality requirements, etc. The next step: our artists will put you in the poster as one of Pocket Troops special forces member. If you are a group of Friends \u2013 that\u2019s perfect! We can make a collage with all of you and add  the name of your alliance + ALL REWARDS ABOVE

MINI TROOPER. SIZE DOES NOT MATTER: Trooper\u2019s miniature plastic figurine. These guys will complement your room interior or will be a nice car dashboard decoration. Notice: they look heroic and tough but still have a quite low resistance against pets and children under 3 Y.O. Unique chance! Figurines will be issued only for Kickstarter backers and in-game Worldwide Leaders who will manage to keep the lead for 2 weeks minimum + ALL REWARDS ABOVE BESIDES "SUPERSTAR"
MINI TROOPER COLLECTOR SET: "MINI TROOPER. SIZE DOES NOT MATTER" + "SUPERSTAR" REWARDS

IN THE SPOTLIGHT: We asked our grannies for help, creating a limited collection of handmade Troopers themed sweaters. They will grant you this unique \u201cchic\u201d and \u201cstylish bastard\u201d look making you a King of any party. Hurry up, the number of grannies is limited + ALL REWARDS ABOVE STARTING WITH "KARMA HEALER" AND DOWN TO "SECOND SKIN" (including)
WARMTH COLLECTOR SET: "IN THE SPOTLIGHT" + "SUPERSTAR" REWARDS
I WANT IT ALL COLLECTOR SET: Trooper\u2019s miniature plastic figurine + Handmade Troopers themed sweater + ALL REWARDS ABOVE STARTING WITH "KARMA HEALER" AND DOWN TO "SECOND SKIN" (including)

THE ONE OF US: We are looking for soul mates, those who are interested to take part in Pocket Troops evolution. The master plan is to work in touch with you, those who pledged this tier, to come up with ideas for some points that are still not covered. Doctor Evil\u2019s Generals names + The name for Terror itself, Doctor Evil + We are adding a new trooper class \u2013 Medic. That would be cool to brainstorm with you on his name and special abilities + Design details for barracks and other HQ rooms + For your valuable help and involvement you will be listed as \u201cThe One of Us\u201d in in-game Board of Heroes screen and the website Hall of Fame. Special thank you on Facebook is also here + ALL NON-COLLECTOR REWARDS ABOVE

WELCOME TO MINSK!: Join us at Heyworks HQ in Minsk, Belarus. We are excited about the opportunity to show our country to you. Here is the brief plan of what we guarantee you on the visit. Full assistance with BY visa issue + Help with travel (costs not included), transfer and accommodation (costs not included) issues + Meet the team and party with us in the office, with pub-crawling through Minsk + We will join you for guided tour to Stalin's Line fortifications Museum and Brest Fortress + Have fun at shooting range with real WWII weapons + We will go for a ride on a real tank with a SHOT from it for you to fulfill your gunner dream + ALL NON-COLLECTOR REWARDS ABOVE
